attributes.action: step down from office and declare a general election due to loss of public confidence,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since labour has been in power the British people are suffering both financially & economically, much due to labours mismanagement and indecisiveness which has resulted in the decline of Great Britain.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Decision2008/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
